About Kwizerwa Arts

Crafting Dreams Into Lasting Furniture

Based in Gisozi, Kigali, Kwizerwa Arts Furniture is more than a furniture store â€” we're a design school and a hub for Rwandan creativity. We blend traditional craftsmanship with modern design to create furniture that's both beautiful and built to last.

Handcrafted Quality

Every piece is meticulously crafted by skilled artisans using traditional techniques.

Made in Rwanda

Proudly supporting local materials and Rwandan craftsmanship heritage.

Custom Designs

Tailored furniture solutions designed to match your unique vision and space.

Furniture School

Training the next generation of furniture designers and craftsmen.
